channel.title: Vue.js on Joan Perals — Web Developer, Creative Technologist, Digital Craftsman
channel.description: Recent content in Vue.js on Joan Perals — Web Developer, Creative Technologist, Digital Craftsman

item.description: At IXDS I had the opportunity to contribute to top emerging design projects by helping make UX concepts tangible. One of the most interesting aspects of my work at IXDS was the close relationship between design and engineering —and one of its most challenging aspects was the need to work in quick iterations while allowing for mid-term development at the same time.

item.title: Spex
